data.eml:eml: Descriptions of three larvae of Osmylus species from Japan (Neuroptera: Osmylidae), with a proposed naming system for the larval sclerites

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matsuno, Shigetomi, Yoshitomi, Hiroyuki (2016): Descriptions of three larvae of Osmylus species from Japan (Neuroptera: Osmylidae), with a proposed naming system for the larval sclerites. Zootaxa 4189 (2): 348-366, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.2.9
